My Works -------

WORKS AND CASE STUDIES

Read-A-Word

This is a word-reader that displays a single word of a given text sequence. It will increase the average reading speed by 20%.

The 'react-native-permanent-storage' package

This react native package will help developers store data into the device's encrypted permanent storage.

The 'sanjeevmalagi.com' website

This portfolio website is built only on HTML and tailwind CSS. It delivers a superfast experience.

In the news -------

Certifications and Recognitions

The Complete Elixir and Phoenix Bootcamp

Completed Elixir and Phoenix Bootcamp and transitioned as Senior backend engineer.

Scripbox-Upwardly Integration

Worked on team which helped in transitioning of holdings of upwardly users to scripbox.

Scripbox NRI offering

Updated the scripbox platform along with eloberate demos to support NRIs to invest in Indian Mutual Funds.

Scripbox-Webengage Integration

Integrated Scripbox website and mobile application with webengage. Which now serves as the main source of user engagement.

Scripbox-UPI Integration

Worked as part of the team responsible for integrating UPI payment system on scripbox. Now it serves as one of most utilized source of revenue.

Modern React with Redux

Completed Modern React with Redux bootcamp.
